title: Untitled, recto and verso [cottage, recto; fragments of two landscapes, verso]
marks: Signature at right edge, LRQ, in black: [R / H]
description: recto:  cottage behind rustic black fence; stone path, flanked by silhouettes of trees with tall trunks; line-drawing trees in background; verso:  fragments of two landscape drawings with trees
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
